content: corrugated cloth designed by kate schoren this is a beginner-level stitch pattern that is reversible and does not curl use a luxurious organic cotton to make a facecloth for you or a washcloth for baby or get out the kitchen cotton and whip up a dishcloth with a new look materials approx 50 grams of worsted weight cotton size us 7 needles straight or circular tapestry needle scissors gauge directions with size 7 us needles cast on 40 sts row 1 purl row 2 knit row 3 knit repeat these three row to desired length bind off weave in ends nothing fancy knits © 2010 by kate schoren this pattern is not for sale projects made from this pattern are not to be sold make one for yourself or for a gift basically be nice okay
